Text: Moodys Teleconference Issuer Financial Analysis Under FASB Statement No Teleconference Issuer Financial Analysis Under FASB Statement No Monday December rd AM New York PM London Dear Client Moodys Investors Services Priority of ClaimsAccounting Standing Committee is pleased to invite you to participate in a teleconference hosted by Patrick Finnegan Arthur Fliegelman and Dr Ashwinpaul Tony Sondhi The teleconference will consist of approximately minutes of prepared remarks followed by a question and answer session Key highlights of the discussion will include Credit and financial analysis issues raised by FAS Moodys views on interpreting financial statements under FAS Problems and pitfalls of statements issued using FAS If you wish to participate please dial one of the following numbers with the password of Moodys approximately minutes prior to the start of the call ALL Callers password Moodys If you are unable to participate in the live call a replay of this teleconference can be accessed until December st by dialing ALL Callers no password is necessary To participate please send an email to with your name company name phone fax email address and any questions for Moodys analysts There is no fee to participate For more information please send an email to or call
